name: Ladder Louie
description:
CONTROLS: Left and Right arrow keys to jump, Up and Down arrow keys to shoot left and right. You can also use WASD. Read in-game for more strategy and tips!

Ladder Louie is a strong man who loves to climb ladders all day and night. But sometimes, climbing ladders can get dangerous! Tap the arrow keys on your keyboard to jump from left to right, and dodge obstacles and hazards, while managing your height carefully. Get up close to an enemy, and blast it off the ladder with a fireball! How long can you keep climbing?

This music in this game is by Eric Skiff, and is licensed under a Creative Commons - Attribution 3.0 Unported License.

Check out more of his music here: http://ericskiff.com/music/
The license is available here: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
